::: {.objectivesBox .objectives data-latex="{iconmonstr-target-4-240.png}"}
So far, you have learnt to ask a RQ, design a study, collect the data, describe the data, and graphically summarise data.
**In this chapter**, you will learn to numerically describe *qualitative* data.
You will learn to:

* summarise quantitative data using the appropriate graphs.
* summarise quantitative data using (when appropriate) using modes, medians and odds to summarise qualitative data.
:::
